response.overview: After her birth, Mahi starts to realize her fatherâ€™s grievances on her mother every day because of giving birth to her. She gets confused about her identity, whether she is a girl or a boy. Later, after losing her parent, Mahi finds herself engulfed in a dark societal reality, and becomes a victim of human trafficking. Somehow she lands in an akhada, where she meets Shimli, another victim of reality. Down the line in her path of life, Mahi discovers a baby girl and realizes the feeling of a mother from within. But destiny is cruel. It has planned something else for her.
response.title: Brihonnola
